TopicTitle: Loading bar stuck with B9 Aerospace!

Articles.Content:
My loading bar stops right at the end. No crashes or anything, it just refuses to budge past that point. This also means I can't play the game at all with B9-Aerospace. I really want to play the game with B9 Aerospace, so help would be appreciated.

It is stuck at "B9_Aerospace/Parts/Cockpit_HL/part/HL_Aero_Cockpit"

I have tried waiting for it, maybe it was just slow. No, 2 hours is long enough. And I know it isn't slow / frozen since the silly little loading things still come and go (E.G; Recruiting Kerbals...).

Sometimes the art in the background disappears but the loading bar stays and the game DOES NOT start. Please help!

Please read the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky at the top of this forum. There's not enough information in your post to identify the source of the hang.

Also, welcome to the forums!
